raw_body: SILVA – W.T.D. – (Former principal Devananda College,​ Ambalangoda and former teacher Dharmasoka College,​ Ambalangoda) – Loving husband of Badra de Silva (former teacher Sangamitta College and Southlands College,​ Galle),​ beloved father of Tharanga (USA),​ Kanchana (USA) and Avanti (USA). Cortege leaves No. 19/​24,​ Kalgewatta,​ Udugama Road,​ Makuluwa,​ Galle at 4 p.m. on Tuesday,​ 11th July. Cremation at Dadalla General Cemetery,​ Galle at 5 p.m.042307
